trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: 操作、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>によって適用された、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>アクション。

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##一時停止、再開、停止、またはそれ以外の場合、ストーリー ボードに対話的にできる制御を一時停止、再開、またはその他の制御、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>対話形式で、設定、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>のプロパティ、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>ControllableStoryboardAction オブジェクトを使用し、(など<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>、または<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) その<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>を参照することで制御する</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 場合、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>の<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>は指定されていない、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>を開始した後に対話的に制御できません</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 参照してください[する方法: イベント トリガーを使用して、ストーリー ボードの後に開始を制御する](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)詳細についてはします。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: 取得または設定、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>の<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>開始した、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>を対話的に制御する</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>の<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>開始した、 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>を対話的に制御する</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 既定値は<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>です。
